Cam::
She screamed as the blasts hit the alarm box.  It silenced the alarm 
being sent to the pred base. The cage started to rock back and forth, 
then it fell to the ground. The small wires on top were still 
energized and a slight humming could be heard. THe cage was now 
electrified on the outside. "WINDLORD!"she cried out in panic and 
fear. Little tears went streaming down her fox face plates.
